patthana16.83:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.83:0.3_0: Next there are nectar with their eyes.
patthana16.83:1.1_0: One gives rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana16.83:2.1_0: One who has not committed the worst kind of offense without making amends for an offense.
patthana16.83:2.1_1: One who has not attained the cause of truth, the reason for something, and the calmation of preocupations.
patthana16.83:2.1_2: One who has not committed the worst kind of offense. They don’t preocupation of preocupations with the latch. They don’t arise because of past deeds.
